verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
May the fragrance of Jesus fill this place
sisters: May the fragrance
of Jesus fill this place
May the fragrance of Jesus fill this place
sisters: Lovely fragrance of Jesus
Rising from the sacrifice
Of lives laid down in adoration

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
May the glory of Jesus fill His church
sisters: May the glory of
Jesus fill His church
May the glory of Jesus fill His church
sisters: Radiant glory of Jesus
Shining from our faces
As we gaze in adoration

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
May the beauty of Jesus fill my life
sisters: May the beauty
of Jesus fill my life
May the beauty of Jesus fill my life
sisters: Perfect beauty of Jesus
Fill my thoughts my words my deeds
My all I give in adoration
